/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from an elevated position, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The road itself is divided into multiple lanes, filled with a variety of vehicles including cars and buses. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their silhouettes faint against the bright sky. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
